Text:
you are welcome!
@187mofo: it's the second time when you post spoilers. Please don't do that again!
there seems to be an audio delay?
Yes it is! 1000 ms (1 sec.) delay. I use BSPlayer and with Ctrl+Shift+Left arrow can be fixed.
thanks alot for specifying that it was a 1000ms delay, i was able to change the audio settings in my player (media player classic) and now its perfect! :D
